title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses a potential suspension for Draymond Green after fighting with a teammate and why this is a good thing for the Warriors dynasty. He explains why one of the best team's in the NFL is NOT a legitimate Super Bowl contender. He tells you who the 3 most underrated quarterbacks are in the NFL right now. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to breakdown what's wrong with the Broncos and Rams offenses. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
